snippet.title: Syberia 3 l "Discover" Official trailer NA l Microids
snippet.description:
Discover the 1st trailer of Syberia 3.

The game will be released on April 25 in North America and April 20 in Europe on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC/Mac

Enter the enchanting world of Benoit Sokal's latest masterpiece.

Join Kate Walker in the unique world of Syberia.
Dive into the story, puzzles, and mysteries of this fabulous adventure, conceived and drawn by Benoit Sokal, with music by Inon Zur.

More info :

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/syberia.series

Twitter : https://twitter.com/syberia

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/microids_official

Steam : http://store.steampowered.com/app/464340
